price: これが、罪悪者たちが（現世で）噓呼ばわりしている地獄。
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
